title: Attributes
text:
There are four attributes for characters; EYES, TEETH, LIMBS, and HEART. Whenever a player controlled character carried out an action they roll 2D6 and add the modifier of the relevant attribute. This is known as rolling +ATTRIBUTE (+EYES, +TEETH, +LIMBS, or +HEART) This determines how successful they are.
An action is any task or activity the player wishes the character to do that is considered risky or has a strong element of chance. Most activities inside combat count as actions. Outside combat trivial tasks will be handled with narration rather than rolls.
The attribute chosen for an action is initially chosen by the player performing the action. If the referee is not happy with the choice the player can attempt to further explain, change the action to fit the attribute, or be content in the referee choosing a more appropriate attribute.

title: Attributes
text:
The Attributes
The four attributes as tied to the four Primeval deities. Conveniently they are also analogs of the four attributes in FIST so FIST traits can be used in PUML and vice versa.

EYES = TACTICAL
TEETH = FORCEFUL
LIMBS = REFLEXIVE
BRAIN = CREATIVE


EYES
Nyxmera is the deity of the sky. Its eyes are the sun, stars, planets, and moons in the sky. NYXMERA loves to watch, enjoying drama and comedy. It is clever and loves to scheme.
You can roll +EYES for assessing and manipulating a situation.
These include:

Knowledge-based tasks
Tactical manoeuvres
Technical operations

E.g engineering, cyber security, medical response, and controlling machinery

Reconnaissance & Research
Imitating and appreciating the arts
Astral powers



TEETH
Tartarus is the deity of the earth. Its mouths are the entrances into its domain and its prison, The DOT. It is angry and destructive.
You can roll +TEETH for bouts of strength, violence, or rage.
These include:

Strength-based tasks
Aggressive manoeuvres
Destruction
Intimidation
Freeing the imprisoned
Earth and fire powers



LIMBS
Proteus is the deity of water. Its limbs represent how it reaches into and shapes living systems whilst in turn being shaped by them. It is adaptable, calm, and flowing.
You can roll +LIMBS for fast and fluid movements.
These include:

Dexterity-based tasks
Reflexive manoeuvres
Use of steady hands and body
Blending in
Going with the flow
Water powers



BRAIN
Gaia is the deity of life. Its brain is the unity of all life, creating a hyperorganism. It is social and mystical.
You can roll +BRAIN for human and paranormal interactions.
These include:

Charisma-based tasks
Diplomatic manoeuvres
Leadership and persuasion
Implementation of unique and creative ideas
Unification
Life and mind powers
